tags.name: person-testimonial
tags.description:
`person-testimonial`

Attributes:

  * `elevation` {`number`} - Visual height of the card.

  * `image` {`string`} - The profile image to display to the left of the quote.

  * `name` {`string`} - Name of the person making the quote.

  * `position` {`string`} - The title / position of the person in question.
